pages.text: There are many different variations of steel, but the variation I should use is a composition of 66% carbon from coal and 33% iron.$(br2)I can add this distribution into a $(l:innovation/burn/crucible)crucible$() over a fire to yield 1 crucible steel ingot.
Crucible steel is still steel after all, so I can use it for much more stronger tools and parts.$(br2)I do hope that I'll be able to make a much stronger steel in the future.
